org.jclouds.glesys

Interface GleSYSAsyncApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    Deprecated. 
    please use org.jclouds.ContextBuilder#buildApi(GleSYSApi.class) as GleSYSAsyncApi interface will be removed in jclouds 1.7.

    @Deprecated
public interface GleSYSAsyncApi
extends Closeable
    Provides asynchronous access to GleSYS via their REST API.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole
    See Also:
    GleSYSApi,
